subject: Invitation: Belfrics

subject: Empower your future
content: Hi Anushree,</br>Just thought we'd let you know that Akhil Kittur, Human Resources at Simplotel just viewed your resume on Instahyre for a Frontend JS Engineer job.</br>They will get in touch by email or phone if your profile is found suitable for the role!</br>You can view the detailed recruiter activity on your profile by clicking here.</br>Thanks,</br>The Instahyre Team
